page.title: 12Hanley Castle Parish Council
page.content: The Parish Council serves the community and makes representation of the needs of this area to the Malvern Hills District Council.(Controlling body for this area.) The Council meets four times a year,its venue alternating between Hanley Swan Village Hall and Hanley Castle High School. Perhaps the most important change in Hanley Swan has been the alteration of the cross roads in 1982. The Parish had been pressurising the County Council to alter this dangerous road junction, as it had been the scene of several deaths and numerous minor road accidents during the last twenty years. Their efforts on behalf of the community were rewarded and happily since the alteration there have been no "crashes" at the cross roads by Hanley Swan pool.They have planted trees to beautify the area.
